original_text: And as he reclined at table in his house, many tax collectors and sinners were reclining with Jesus and his disciples, for there were many who followed him.
korean_text: 그의 집에 앉아 잡수실 때에 많은 세리와 죄인들이 예수와 그의 제자들과 함께 앉았으니 이는 그러한 사람들이 많이 있어서 예수를 따름이러라

sentences.original_text: And as he reclined at table in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 집에서 식탁에 기대어 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: many tax collectors and sinners were reclining with Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 세리와 죄인들이 예수와 함께 기대어 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: for there were many who followed him
